channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicle Canberra Road DA7, 1st December
item.description:

item.title: Mounds of litter and leaves and smashed glass, 1st December
item.description:
The junction of Blithedale Road and Brodrick grove has mounds of litter and leaves and broken glass and bottles. The pavement/road crossing is becoming impassable by anyone with any kind of impairment such as physical or visual and I doubt a wheelchair can pass.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brodrick Grove, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet
